name: Horned Scropuli Great Hammer
description:
These glorious Great Hammers ring true with the war-cry of The Horned Scropuli, a species of giant, insect-like beasts from which the resilient chitinous material is harvested.
The ornate ridges and aerodynamic shape replicate the fierce attacks of the Scropuli, allowing air to pass through, causing a deafening howl and perfect tone upon impact.
Due to the long and dangerous process of hunting and manufacturing these weapons, only a handful have been forged thus far...
